Cameron Chapman is a British actor, social media star, television personality, model, theater artist, online sensation and public figure from London, England.

This actor is known for his magnificent work in Hollywood movies and television shows.

My study indicates that Cameron Chapman began his acting career as a stage actor before he had the opportunity to work in the film industry.

How did Cameron Chapman start his professional career?

After appearing on the well-known television show Lockwood & Co., Chapman became well known. On January 27, 2023, Netflix released the first episode of this series.

Along with other well-known actors such as Ruby Stokes, Ali Hadji-Heshmati, Michael Clarke, Hayley Konadu, Rhianna Dorris, Paddy Holland, Rico Vina, Jack Bandeira and many more, Cameron played Anthony Lockwood, the protagonist of the series.
